DetectEntities.name: DetectEntities
DetectEntities.documentation: Inspects the specified text for the specified type of entities and returns information about them.

Name.documentation: The name of the attribute for the entity.

Score.documentation: The confidence that the attribute applies to the entity.

Attribute.documentation: Additional information that applies to an entity.

Text.documentation: UTF-8 text string to search for entities.

Types.documentation: The type of entity to search for. If you specify the type, the input document is searched for only the specified type. If you do not specify a type, the document is searched for all entity types.

Entities.documentation: A collection of entities identified in the input text. For each entity, the response provides the entity text, the entity type, where the entity text begins and ends, and the level of confidence that Amazon DeepInsight has in the detection.

BeginOffset.documentation: The 0-based character offset in the input text that shows where the entity begins. The offset returns the UTF-8 code point in the string. A code point is the abstract character from a particular graphical representation. For example, a multi-byte UTF-8 character maps to a single code point.

EndOffset.documentation: The 0-based character offset in the input text that shows where the entity ends. The offset returns the UTF-8 code point in the string. A code point is the abstract character from a particular graphical representation. For example, a multi-byte UTF-8 character maps to a single code point.

Score.documentation: The level of confidence that Amazon DeepInsight has in the accuracy of the detection.

SubType.documentation: Describes the specific type of entity with a class of entities.

InternalServerException.documentation: An internal server error occurred. Retry your request.

InvalidEncodingException.documentation: The input text was not in UTF-8 character encoding. Check you text then retry your request.

ServiceUnavailableException.documentation: The service is temporarily unavailable. Retry your request.

TextSizeLimitExceededException.documentation: The size of the text exceeds the limit. Use a smaller document.

TooManyRequestsException.documentation: You have made too many requests. Wait a while and try your request again.
